name: Night Sky (westindie)
description:
This is a simple platformer that I put together when I came up with the idea of making a challenging game that can easily be played in one sitting.

9 Stages in total

Leaderboard

Controls:  

  • Up - W or Up Arrow
  • Right - D or Right Arrow
  • Down - S or Down Arrow,
  • Left - A or Left Arrow
  • Shoot Arrow - Mouse Left Click
  • Throw Bomb - Mouse Right Click
  • Pause - P
  • Select Menu Option - Mouse Left Click
